parse: Verb - Present Indicative Middle or Passive - 3rd Person Plural
str2: To reverence, worship, adore. Middle voice of an apparently primary verb; to revere, i.e. Adore.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative 1st Person Singular
str2: I, the first-person pronoun. A primary pronoun of the first person I.
Accusative case of a derivative of the base of massaomai; folly, i.e. to no purpose.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: To teach, direct, admonish. A prolonged form of a primary verb dao; to teach.
An injunction, ordinance, precept. From entellomai; an injunction, i.e. Religious precept.
A man, one of the human race. From aner and ops; man-faced, i.e. A human being.
